review: If you don't have a smart TV this is a solution at a reasonably priced, I use it for YouTube, Netflix and Google Movies, easy to move from one TV to another.
author: Alberto

review: I would recommend this to anyone who wants to stream Netflix movies on their TV. We used a laptop to select and download the videos then send them to the TV. Once I got the hang of this it was relatively easy to do and the movies ran from beginning to end flawlessly.  As I said, it took a while for me to get this setup and running correctly.  In fairness to Google, I discovered that I had a defective router a week later. It is quite possible that some of the issues I had with setting up Chromecast may have been due to a defective router.

author: Joshua C Rapp

review: My purchase of the Chromecast was more or less in the dark. I did not know what to expect, but since I own a Roku I could at least imagine. The difference between this and Roku or Apple TV is the way it work and the channels available at the moment. March 2014  I am stating that I use my Android Phone, ChromeBook, laptop and iPad (all from work) to send content to my television. I am own one flat screen in the livingroom and go here to watch TV when my wife is watching Lifetime. I can view Youtube, Hulu and Netflix so I am at peace and the world is good. I hate that no sports channels are available. I can of course bring some content onto my laptop and cast that but it is choppier than if I had a real developed App Channel.Here is what I had to do.1. Put the chromecast into my HDMI port2. Plug in a USB cable from my tv to the chromecast to power the device3. The settings to get on my wireless were painless4. I added Hulu and chromecast to my Chrome Browser5.I started Hulu on my laptop6. I then used Chromecast (located in top right corner of my browser) to cast this tab to my TVDone. This is the beginning and I only hope that I don't have to buy new hardware as the service improves. This is helping me get from under the thumb of Cable and Satellite.
author: Crenshaw
